summary: This mod will give Ivarstead a badly needed update, as we a know Ivarstead is pretty shite. this mod will include; Full Blacksmithing Facilities, a Blacksmith Vendor (Fenrarke), a General Store and Vendor (Sapphire), Your very own home, a new entrance, foot bridge and dock....
descriptionHtml:
This mod was made as I felt Ivarstead was quite...... bland. No blacksmith, no general store, no gate and no home, Ivarstead has nothing useful. Well we can change that has to had people! My Ivarstead Revamp Mod will add full blacksmithing facilities, a blacksmith merchant, a general store and your very own player home! There also has been a gate and guard walkway added, along with a small dock and foot bridge.

I have put a lot of time into this mod and it is my very first one. I plan on adding new features (e.g. guards on bridge, cart, stables) but all suggestions are welcome and I will try and cater to them as best I can!

Please notify me if you find any bugs, problems or anything that needs to be corrected and I will try to fix them all.

This mod can also be located on Steam:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=229948562

Update Log:
1.1 - Initial Nexus release

1.2 - Update adding a Jarl (Jarl Orkul), his Steward (Valmir) and his son and Housecarl (Grul), who can be a follower and partner, and of course a Longhouse where they all can be found. Stables added just outside the new entrance, with 4 horses and the Stable Buck, Wilbur. Finally, a New Guard Tower has been added just down the hill from Ivarstead, which can be used as a player home (Bed, Cooking Pot, Arcane Enchanter, Personal Storage, Supplies etc.) and a new unmarked quest has been added, just read the note beside the door. Hat tip to LABTECH for the ideas and requests!

Made By Eddie Mallon
author: asap-ed
